Chinese.Description: 你的四肢变成八条蛛腿，你可以像蜘蛛一样移动，但你现在只能用嘴叼着一件东西。同时，你的食量增大，并倾向于食肉。蜘蛛将不再敌视你，但是，闪光果和烟雾果对你是致命的。

English.Description: Your slugcat becomes a spider hybrid! It can move like a spider, eat meat, and is friends with other spiders. However, its hunger grows, and spore puffs and flashbangs become its fatal weakness.
